member.name: IDataObjectProvider.GetDataObject
member.summary: Gets an representation of the current DataPackage object.
member.param: The address of an interface pointer that, when this method returns successfully, points to the IDataObject representation of the DataPackage object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataObjectProvider.SetDataObject
member.summary: Wraps an instance as a Windows Runtime DataPackage.
member.param: An interface pointer to the data object from which to build the DataPackage object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataObjectProvider
member.summary: Provides methods that enable you to set or retrieve a DataPackage object's , which the DataPackage uses to support interoperability. The DataPackage object is used by an app to provide data to another app.
